titles: To his sacred maiesty [sic], a panegyrick on his coronation. By John Dryden.
author: Dryden, John, 1631-1700.
publisher: printed for Henry Herringman, at the Anchor on the Lower walk in the New Exchange,
notes: In two states: state 1, pg. 4, line 18 has 'Not only king of us but of the year'; state 2, pg. 4, line 18 has 'Not king of us alone but of the year'.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Charles --  II, --  King of England, 1630-1685 --  Coronation --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
